---
title: "Uniform-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("runif--1-1.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
UnifM11Call <- stream_in(file("runif--1-1-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
UnifM11Result <- stream_in(file("runif--1-1_0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Unif.M1.1.OpenAI <- left_join(UnifM11Call,UnifM11Result)
Full.Unif.M1.1.0806 <- left_join(UnifM11$params, Unif.M1.1.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Unif.M1.1.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Unif.M1.1.0806$Outcome <- map_chr(UnifM11$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(UnifM11Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Unif.M1.1.0806$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Unif.M1.1.0806, file="Full.Unif.M1.1.0806.RData")
```
